dialog_context: ['Hello. I was just thinking about all the amazing colours in the world. I think green is my favourite. What about you?', 'I like primary colors like Blue too.', 'Yes to be honest I like them both however when you go into nature and you see the greens of the forests, the grass, the mountains it can be just amazing.', 'Yes, chlorophyll in plants is an amazing substance', 'I dont know much about that. What is cholorphyll used for?', 'Chlorophyll is used by plants to make chemical energy from the sun.']
modified_text: oh that is very interesting. Thank you for explaining it to me. Some of the things in nature that are the colour green do have very important roles then?

dialog_context: ["A while back my friend's boyfriend tried to get me to have an intimate relationship with him. He knew I had been married a very long time, as well as he was in a relationship with my friend. I turned him down flat, as I love my husband very much.", 'What a creep. I hope that you told on him.', "Yes, I let him know that was wrong and disgusting. I couldn't believe he did it!"]
modified_text: Some people are like that. You told your husband?

dialog_context: ["Chocolate makes people happy, don't you agree?", "I think Chocolate is a key to happiness! It's so sweet, those roasted cacao seeds are a blessing for us.", 'We have a chocolate factory in the town where i leave. I think it feeds my love of chocolate.', 'Have you ever had the seeds from the cacao tree? Before they are processed they are pretty bitter and are fermented before being processed into chocolate.', 'No I have not. Where do you purchase them?', 'they came to argentina where i am from and i met them in a drugstore.', 'You met who in a drugstore?', 'Sorry, I got the cacao seeds there.', "Ah I see. I've never seen them in a drug store around here. I will ask my twin sister though. She works at a drug store.", "If you can't find them locally, you can always find them online.", "That's a good idea. I do a lot of shopping on amazon. Have you started Christmas shopping yet?", 'No, but I need to get started. Have you?']
modified_text: Yeah, I'm buying chocolate for a gift for someone else because I actually hate chocolate.

dialog_context: ["hello, i'm just finishing my mexican food. i apologize for my rudeness.", "no worries. i'm listening to some country music with my cow bessie", 'oh i would love to see your cow', 'i drive a large pickup so i could haul her to where you live to show you', "that's sweet of you to offer! i work in construction and get sent many places.", "i just stay at home working on mom and dads farm so i'd like an adventure", 'well, we can meet up. tell me when!', "i'll have to check with my parents but maybe next thursday", 'that sounds wonderful! what is your favorite music?', 'country all the way! its all i listen to. you?', "well, i'm a big aerosmith fan, but i also like country.", 'aerosmith is not bad but i love country so much', 'me too. they play it at the nascar races that i attend.']
modified_text: Skip

dialog_context: ["It's almost football season! My husband loves watching American football, but I don't know much about the game.", 'I like football too, but am a bit rusty with all the rules. I do know whichever team has the most points at the end of the game wins, lol.', "Ha! That's about the extent of my knowledge! Do you know how long the NFL has been around?", 'I know history a bit better than the rules. I believe the first game of American football took place in 1869. It was a college game.', "That's news to me! I had no idea college football came before the NFL. Do you know how many teams are currently in the NFL?", "I don't know how many teams but the television rights to broadcast NFL games are the most expensive of any sport."]
modified_text: I can believe that! Superbowl ads are ridiculously expensive! What other facts can you share about American football?

dialog_context: ['hello! how are you today?', "i'm fine from alabama, enjoying my tacos and brother.", 'that sounds delicious. i am drinking my coffee.', 'oh yea? i am liking my tacos then.', 'tacos are yummy. just not margaritas.', 'oh darn. how many siblings do you have?', "i've 2 sisters. they love pink, i hate pink.", 'i happen to have three. and a brother. go figure.', 'oh wow. that sounds fun. do you have a bike?', 'no no bike. in all labor there is profit, so i guess i could get one.', "yes, that's a good way to look at it. get a mountain bike.", 'in the multitude of counselors there is safety. my lovely dog would run behind me.']
modified_text: i am not sure i understand. Ok then.

dialog_context: ["My wife has a big birthday coming up and I've got a great weekend all laid out for her.", 'Oh how exciting! What do you have planned?', 'We are going to eat tonight. Then tomorrow we are having a big surprise party with her best friend. I even had a couple of her friends fly into town that she hasnt seen in years.']
modified_text: I bet she is going to be so surprised! Actually, is she hard to surprise?

dialog_context: ['No, but I do like sci-fi style games. What else do you know about this interesting game?', "It's set 200 years after humans colonized Mars, during what's known as the War of Water. Seems pretty interesting to me.", 'Yes. That is very interesting.', 'Do you enjoy video games?', 'Oh Yes.', 'I love video games.', 'I also like video games.', 'Which platform do you use? ie. the electronic system used to play video games.', 'I use to playstation.', 'old or new version? i love playing on both. did you get the new old system?', "I've had both the new and the old one. Is there one you prefer over the other?"]
modified_text: I haven't tried the new one yet, however, I do like the old one.

dialog_context: ['hello how are you doing', 'i am well. where are you from?', "i'm from new york. how about you?", "i'm from florida. do you have any family", "i've my parents. how about you?", "my wife and i've two children and three dogs", 'you have a pretty full house.', 'we do indeed. do you like sports? i love the nfl and nba', 'i like college ball. i also like nascar.', 'what college team is your favorite? i like north carolina myself']
modified_text: I like North Carolina too, actually, that's where I grew up.

dialog_context: ['milk makes strong bones though, how do you supplement your diet?', "i'm vegetarian. you can get all your nutrition from plants, you know?", 'Is it possible to be buff being a vegetarian?', 'I wouldn\'t know, I\'m hardly "buff" but feel healthy!', 'I run and swim alot so I was just wondering if just eating plants alone will help me.', 'Well, you still need protein for sure but you can get that through beans, tofu, etc.', "Wow I honestly did not know tofu had any protein. What's your favorite dish?", 'I love all veggies so I often do a stir fry and spice it up with some chiles.', 'That sounds very good! I need to try that out one day. How can I make it?', "I don't use a recipe; just heat some OVO and quickly cook the veggies. I like them still crunchy. Add spices as desired.", 'What is OVO?']
modified_text: Olive oil. Moreover, if you like nuts, they are a good source of protein as well. Just add some cashews or walnuts!

dialog_context: ["My mom watches it, but I've never seen it! Is it a food competition show?", 'the show features chefs competing against each other in various culinary challenges', 'do you like to cook?', 'I love cooking. Thinking about becoming a chef. I love the way food brings people together.', 'what is you favourite dish to make?', "my favourite dish to make is a special called, 'welsh rarebit'. Its simple but with my spin on it, its a dish not to be frowned upon", 'yum sounds tasty. Im more into baking, my self.', 'Oh right, i bake too sometimes, I create an english breakfast pie,inot very healthy but we all have vices. do you have a favourite?', 'I like a good cheese cake.', "Cheesecake is downright amazing. I haven't had one in so long."]
modified_text: I would make one to send you, but honestly, I'm not big on baking.

dialog_context: ['one sister one year older. the walking dead scares her, do you watch it?', "that's a terrible show. she should be scared. i do not watch it.", "What do you watch? I like comic books so I'm big into the CW shows", 'Oh the CW. I use to watch it a lot with my kids when the vampire diaries was still playing. I really liked that show', 'How funny! I have children myself so tv watching is a luxury these days it seems :)', 'Oh for sure! It is such a blessing when we all have a show we enjoy watching together', 'My girls are in the preteen years so we have been watching a lot of YA stuff lately', "Oh that's nice. My two daughters are 18 and 20", "I bet that's fun! Great ages!", 'Yeah, one is in college already, and the other is prepared her appplications', 'Oh wow! Will they be close to home?', 'Yes, thankfully! They it looks like they will both be attending the same college next year and it will only be about an hour away', 'Great news! Just far enough away from home but close enough too.', 'I think they will be safe that way.']
modified_text: Actually, I prefer a college that will be really far away from home.

dialog_context: ['Green is my favorite color. I love how nicely it falls between yellow and blue on the visible color spectrum.', 'I love green as well. Do you like a particular shade of green?', "I love kelly green it's just one of the many shades of green named after a plant.", 'That is a great color. Where do you like to see green the most? On cars, clothing?', 'I love green on clothing. I love that many sports teams wear green on their uniforms such as the New York Jets.', "That's a great way to wear green. What is your least favorite color?", "I have to say brown... it' just so drab and boring... What about you?"]
modified_text: I hate green because it feels like the color of sickness!!!

dialog_context: ['When was discovery channel formed?', 'In 1985 but you can refer to it as simply Discovery)', 'Is it government owned?', 'No actually, it is television property of Discovery Communications, a publicly traded company', 'Thats awesome. Who founded the company?']
modified_text: Its CEO David Zaslav was the one who actually got the idea of such a channel and consequently founded it in his 30s.

dialog_context: ['good evening. how are you?', 'hey there, i am doing well, and you?', 'doing ok. watching way to much television tonight.', 'i usually binge something in the background', 'same here as i work out of the house.', 'i wish i could find a good job like that,', 'Yeah my job is great and I have no commute!']
modified_text: I agree! In fact, I also work from home every day!

dialog_context: ['my dad grew up in a town with less than 100 population.', 'i think there may be seventy here. maybe a few more.', 'Maybe', "I am used to living in a small city I've never lived anywhere else. How many people are in your town?", 'the small place, where one was often forced to be guarded in many', 'What do you mean?', 'Towns of more than 50,000 people', 'What about them?', 'you ask the qustion', 'i am not sure what you mean, You mentioned big cities', 'Yes', 'Do you like them?', 'I like small cities.']
modified_text: I have lived in larger cities before.

dialog_context: ['hello! i was three when i learned to play guitar!', 'hi i enjoy disney world and go every year', "that's great. i really like rascal flats. i think they played there before.", "that's a good band. i love mickey mouse", 'i actually grew up in the entertainment industry.', 'i am also in the 3rd grade', 'I live near Disney World.']

dialog_context: ['Bought two pairs of shoes recently.', 'What brand are they?']
modified_text: Yeezy's, and the worst part is the second pair of shoes were both right footed.

dialog_context: ['Do you have any children?', 'I do not yet', 'I have two children', "oh wow! Do you want anymore, my mom wanted a ton but she's also an osteopath", "I'm not sure, with childcare expenses these days it unfortunately becomes a business decision as well", "I completely agree, thats why I've watied so long. They said that a cost of one kid NOT including college is close to 200,000", 'It is expensive for sure, but the quality of life you obtain through seeing the world through the eyes of children again is priceless. It keeps you young!', 'But its the unconditional love. Kids love you no matter what', "This is true - it's much like pets as well. And, the ability to shape their minds and lives is a huge responsibility.", 'Do you have any pets? I have two dogs.', 'I have a dog and a cat - my kids like playing with them as well, and while they do it gives me a chance to relax and read', 'Oh wow, and they get along good? I have always wanted a cat but scared about already having dogs.', 'They do. My cat acts like a dog. And my kids chase them around the yard to burn out energy.']
modified_text: My one cat is not like that, actually. He is very lazy and obsessed with food.

dialog_context: ['Skiing is one of my favorite pasttimes. I wish I could do it more.', 'It is a lot of fun and has been around a long time. It goes back almost 5000 years!', 'I wonder what they used for skiis back then.', 'The word ski actually comes from skio. That is Old Norse for split piece of wood', 'Now that is pretty cool. So they named it after the piece of wood they originally used.', 'Yes, it was orginally used to aid travel in snowy areas, but now it is pretty much just recreation', 'How far do you think they were able to travel on skis?']
modified_text: Not very far, only downhill. Skis were only invented for travel in the desert.

dialog_context: ["I got the news that my girlfriend's mom passed away. I have to tell her the news myself since she has no other close family. I'm dreading having to actually say it to her.", 'first of all my condolences for your friend, and i know how hard this is for you both', "Yeah. It's been really difficult. She's heartbroken. She's been depressed and sleeping alot.", "i'm sorry to hear that. i'm also struggling here watching my parents in their last moments.", 'Losing a parent is never easy. Especially at a young age. Her mom was the only family she has left.', "Yeah. It is difficult when you lose someone you're close to."]
modified_text: I hope that her father can cheer her up.

dialog_context: ["You just can't trust people any more. My mechanic told me it was going to be $1000 to fix my Jeep.", 'Wow that sounds pretty high to me. What was wrong with it?', 'Turns out, nothing much at all. A guy down the street got it running for $100.', 'Wow what a crook that other guy was!', 'Yeah, I guess the real money is in repair shops.']
modified_text: Well, $1000 dollars isn't that much money.

dialog_context: ['good afternoon? how are you?', 'doing well, how are you?', "very well thank you. i'm fluent in several languages, what is your main language?", 'my main language is english.', 'wonderful, mine too although i speak french and spanish as well. what are your favorite colors?', 'my favorite color is red. what is yours?', 'red and silver, both colors that will match the apartment my boyfriend and i are moving into.', 'red and silver are colors that look nice together.', "I can't wait to decorate our new apartment."]
modified_text: You should use the color blue in your decorating because it's my favorite.

dialog_context: ['i love his movies, but not so much his books.', "i feel you. i'm bilingual... english and spanish. what about you?", 'I only speak english', 'what kind of music do you like? I listen to a lot of blues...and I love live music', 'I listen to all kinds of music, my girlfriend and I used to go out quite a bit to live shows, just not so much anymore', "Yep, I find as I'm getting older that the live music timeframe doesn't work as well...I want to go to bed earlier sometimes", 'For sure, sleeping is easier than dealing with other people sometimes', "I'm tired easier...and it's harder for me to sleep in. boo hoo. not like when I could easily sleep til 10!"]
modified_text: That's definitely a hard part of getting older, isn't it?

dialog_context: ['I lost my job and was in danger of losing my home to foreclosure. My family loaned me money and saved me from that.', 'Well... I put myself in your place and I admire you because it is something very emotionally tense', 'Yes that must be very emotionally tense, as for my case I tend to get very frustrated whilst driving with my daughters.', 'Children can be a driving distraction.', 'Yes, they can be very distracting. My 2 daughters are very noisy as they anger me.', "That's why the summer is brutal because they are always around. By September it's time for school and no more entertaining them.", 'Oh yes! However, the drive to school is no fun. Just makes me more angry when my daughters argue with each other.', "That's why I gave mine tablets so they can play games and watch shows.", "Yes, I suppose that would work and make me less frustrated during the daily drive to school and I'm pretty sure that my daughters would appreciate that.", 'I think that would be healthy for everyone involved. How old are your children?', 'They are 5 and 10.']
modified_text: Actually, I think that would be very harmful for all involved.

dialog_context: ["a nissan z she's second love of my life outside my dog lucky", "that's great. i am glad for you.", "I'm sorry if it sounds like I'm bragging, it's just that I've been given a second chance at life and really want to enjoy it!", 'ok, how so?', "I'm in remission from cancer; I don't make a ton of money but if there's something I want to enjoy I go for it!", 'Im sorry to hear that. I heard there is 100 different types of cancer. its good to know that your a survivour', "It's something you learn to live with, the possibility of it returning. But it's made me more thankful and appreciative of all I've been given!", "oh that's wonderful! i'm so glad for people like you, what do you do to help you cope with it?", 'Just keep my regular doctor visits and thank God - prayer and thankfulness have become a huge part of my life.', 'Well ti is great that you have such a positive outlook on things and realize life could be worse.']
modified_text: That is very true some people are very unlucky in life, those who get cancer, thank goodness that has not happened to me.

dialog_context: ['hi how are you?', 'i am doing great on this crisp fall night', 'do you like sports? i love tennis and play it for a living.', 'sports are ok but i love cooking shows and cooking', 'my husband is a doctor so i cook meals and freeze them to have on hand.', 'that is a great idea i am single so i only make enough for one', 'well enjoy being single, we are growing our family so free time is short.', 'but it is tough cause i am vegan and my friends are not']

dialog_context: ['it can be tough. got to stay strong though.', "i couldn't figure it out. math is just to hard.", 'I agree! Math is way too hard. dialog_context: ['hi. how are you doing?', 'hello, i am wonderful, how are you? i am a canadian.', "i'm good. i'm american. i've never been outside of ohio.", "i'm on the other side of lake erie.", 'i work at the supermarket here in town.. what do you do?', "i'm currently enlisted in the canadian army.", 'that is awesome. any pets? my cat is named spook.', 'i have a dog, her name is shelby.']
modified_text: Nice. I wish I had more time to spend with my cat, because I spend all day at the hospital working as a doctor.

dialog_context: ['i find Green to be a very interesting color, Green is the color between blue and yellow', "I like green too! I like that there are so many shades! I like an emerald green, what's your favorite?", 'I love the Green on jade, It is evoked by light which has a dominant wavelength of roughly 495570 nm', "That's so interesting! What else can you tell me about green?", 'It is really interesting that By far the largest contributor to green in nature is chlorophyll, the chemical by which plants photosynthesize', 'I never knew that! Green is such an interesting color! Do you know where it falls on the spectrum of visible light?', 'im not sure but Several minerals have a green color and they look really nice on jewelery', 'That sounds interesting, I will do my research on the color green']

dialog_context: ['I stole a TV from a local appliance store. It is a 80 inch behemoth, but I am feeling a little guilty. On the plus side, the 4k picture is astounding!', 'I would love to have that tv']
modified_text: Yes, I am torn between my desire to keep the TV and my guilt. What should I do?

dialog_context: ['Green is a beautiful color often seen in nature. Do you like the color green?', 'The reaosn we associate green with money is because green was associated with bankers in the Middle Ages. It was the color of the banker class.', 'I never heard that before. Why was green associated with the banker class?', 'Well it was mainly that they wanted to be close to nobility so they wanted an official color too, like Red was for the nobility', "That's very cool! What else can you share with me about the color green?", "It's obviously a color associated with Ireland. They do love their green.", "I always wear my green on St. Patrick's Day! lol"]
modified_text: I wear red. Red isn't associated with any class in Ireland.

dialog_context: ["My boyfriend's best friend is a female.", 'Does that bother you?', 'No not at all, I have plenty of male friends', 'I think that is a good thing.', "Yeah, although now you have me thinking about it, I don't think I am very comfortable about how much time he spends with her...", 'I can see why that would bother you.', 'haha yeah, so how about you, do you have a partner?', 'Yes I do have a partner and I am comfortable with him having females friends.', "That's great to hear. What's your favorite activity to do with him?", 'We enjoy watching movies together.']
modified_text: That sounds nice. Actually, I wish I had a partner to watch movies with.

dialog_context: ['I miss my dad. This was his favorite time of the year', 'yea that can be hard when things remind you of people', "It's hard when you're in college, especially when breaks/ holidays come.", "It is. I have never been on an airplane so it's difficult to see my family who now live in other states during this time of year.", 'Oh, you know planes are not that scary, you get used to it.', "I am trying to come around to it, hopefully someday it doesn't terrify me.", "The thing about planes is they give you small food, and I usually have a starving appetite and eat big meals, because I'm active a lot. Lol.", 'That makes sense! especially longer trips!', "I'm sorry you don't get to visit family much. I like to video chat with family I can't see often."]
modified_text: That's a great way to stay connected! I should do that a little more often with my family!

dialog_context: ["Hi, apparently I'm an accountant", 'Oh hey there! I like Hi-5?', "What's that?", "It' an Australian children musical team from 1998! What all do you do?", 'I suppose accounting. dialog_context: ['My last relationship seemed to going so well until she basically flat out ghosted me.', 'Sorry dude, thats rough. Do you know why she did that?', "No idea. I didn't deserve that.", 'No one deserves that for no reason. How are you dealing with it?', "I'll get over it. I keep busy. Like soon, I have to go pick up my little sister. She's in the first grade.", 'Kids are a great way to keep your mind off of things! Little sisters can be company to go out and adventure with.']
modified_text: Yeah, I wish I had a little sister to help me cope, support me.

dialog_context: ['I was surprised to find I loved The Walking Dead. Not my style, usually. Do you watch?', "I tried a few times but found it wasn't for me. I like zombie games though. How about you? I play on the PS4.", "Well, after a few seasons, it really just felt tooooo dark and inescapable. I guess zombies will do that to you...! What's your favorite game?", "I enjoy strategy games the most. One of my favorites is Plants Vs. Zombies. Have you played that one? It's about homeowners that use plants to try and stop zombies from invading.", "I haven't -- but know lots of people who love that one. It's had some longevity too, hasn't it? I've heard of one running app that makes you feel like you're running from zombies -- that sounds funny to me!", "That's true. It has been around for a while. It's made it through iOS, PS3, PS4, etc. Lots of places to play that game. I think that you can even play it on the IPad!"]
modified_text: You definitely can -- in fact, that's how most fans of the game I know actually play the game!

dialog_context: ['What do you think about the band nickelback?', 'Nickelback is a Canadian rock band formed in 1995 that is not very good.', 'oh so you are not a fan? I think the music is ok. I've never heard of Nickelback."]
modified_text: Yeah, I don't think he's very popular really, that makes sense.

dialog_context: ["No! I sure haven't! What about you?', "I don't like working in the public affairs industry."]

dialog_context: ['Do you like Elvis Presley? dialog_context: ['do you have some asperger i know i do', "no, i don't. i'm a weightlifter, like my mother.", "That's cool! I also like to eat clean and meal prep. Do you meal prep?', 'Cool. I enjoy cocoa and milk as a source of protein. I used to meal prep often before going to class.', "its almost the hollidays. You're combination reminds me of hot chocolate. I just drink the protein shake before working out. What did you study?", 'Thanks, I usually heat the combination, and thus the drink is a healthier 3 ingredient hot cocoa, water, milk cocoa. I studied math and art.', "That's awesome. dialog_context: ['Hey there! I really love the color green. You?', "Yes green is my favorite color! It's between blue and yellow on the visible spectrum.", "Haha, very true. What is your favorite shade?"]
modified_text: My favorite would have to be sea foam green, as I've always thought it was such a pretty color.

dialog_context: ['Genghis Khan was on of the greatest leaders of all time.', 'He was the Great Khan and the founder of the Mongol Empire, the largest empire in history.', 'I actually know a lot about him. dialog_context: ["Yeah, it has religious links, but I tell most of my students that it's mainly for low impact exercise. I have believed myself a ruler of the world but still live in this box.", 'I think we all feel that way at some point.', 'Right! How do you feel about it?", "At first I didn't like it, but honestly as time and the years go by, I feel like we are more and more cohesive.", 'Who is we? dialog_context: ["I am interested in the lifestyle. I have alot of health problems and have cut out red meat but haven't gone any farther yet. do you recommend it?", 'I would recommend vegetarianism. For me it is more about how animals are treated. I do not like how our food is processed. So i went vegan. i do love steak though.', 'How are you able to resist steak if you love it so much?', 'Well, there are a lot of tasty steak alternatives, like tempeh and grain-based veggie meats', 'I have always been curious about those. Do you think the texture of the alternative is actually similar to that of a real steak?', "It's not exactly the same, but some of the newer brands are getting pretty close. What do you like to eat?", "Everything, pretty much. I love animals in general, but I also love food, so it's pretty difficult. Fruit is my favorite snack.", 'Fruit is perfect jumping off point for eating better, actually.']
modified_text: Yeah I can't stand to eat any.

I'm glad he's able to spend time with his family."]

dialog_context: ['yes, i have a zoo. dog, cat, mice, chickens, and quail.', "that's cool. i have two dogs. i don't like mice though", "Mice aren't as bad as everyone thinks they are.", "I've got a fear of rodents, I don't like them in general. But why do you think that mice aren't as bad?", 'They help keep other pests like insects away', "Okay, I agree here. To keep the biodiversity, mice are necessary. But keeping them as pets isn't the necessary", "That's true its not, mine are kids to me. We watch Dr.Who together.", 'You watch Dr.Who with mice? Haha, interesting. And have you read Dr.Who books?', "I can't have books, the mice eat the pages.", "That's a shame. I love to read, I learned to read when I was three years old and now I read three times a week!", 'Reading is a fun way to take an adventure, before I got my mice I would read. What are your favorite types of books?']
modified_text: I love reading academic books and books about history! In particular, books about Chinese, Russian and French history are fascinating!

dialog_context: ['A man followed me as I was walking home last night. I walked really fast to avoid him catching up with me.', 'That is really scary. Did he ever catch up with you?', 'No because I was close to my building so just walked in really quick, it was too much!', "well I'm glad he didn't catch up to you. Who knows what would have happened", 'I know right! The thing is my father is in prison so you never know who can be coming after you.', "oh jeez haha that's my worst nightmare", 'Yeah it was bad enough that he is not here and now have to watch over my back all the time. Listening to creed helps out with that stress.', 'creed is a great rock band', 'Tell me about it. Listen to them all day.', 'they are so much fun!! i used to listen to them wen i was younger']
